DOC.brief_title: The Feasibility Diet Exercise Intervention Diabetics During Treatment Non-muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine effect carbohydrate restrict ( CR ) diet bladder cancer patient diabetes . The goal pilot study determine CR diet exercise routine feasible patient population follow . Participants study receive meal tailor specific need . A registered dietitian work establish guideline meal follow progress throughout study . Participants ask study 12 month . A participant ask make total 16 in-person visit course 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis nonmuscleinvasive bladder cancer Have complete Transurethral Resection Bladder Tumor ( TURBT ) procedure Diagnosis diabetes prediabetes , use diabetic medication , show sign diabetes would prompt diabetic screen Evidence muscleinvasion metastatic disease BMI le 18.5 and/or score `` severe malnourish '' category patient generate subjective global assessment ( PGSGA ) Unable complete exercise regimen deem fall risk Participating research study involve form treatment intervention
